title: The "How To Run a Day Care Center" Edition
description:
On this episode of Working, David Plotz talks to day care manager Dannae Sewell about balancing different expectations for child development, and how to tailor care to each child’s needs. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Slate's podcast about work explores how a day care manager balances different parenting styles.
